headline.main: TUNISIAN AIR FORCE 'POOLS BEST BRAINS'; Squadrons of Many Allied Nations Cooperating in Africa

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Feb. 28 (AP) -- A Royal Air Force statement today, explaining the new Northwest African Air Force set-up headed by Major Gen. Carl A. Spaatz, said that the best brains "of the Allied Nations have been pooled."
